( "My font" is included as a library in example files 13, 14, 15, 16, 17, 18 )

"constants"

	FONT HEADER = F0F0F0F0h;
	FIXED WIDTH FONT = 1;
	PROPORTIONAL FONT = 2;

	OFFSET FONT ALIGNMENT	= 1;
	OFFSET FONT BODY	= 2;
	OFFSET FONT WIDTH	= 3;
	OFFSET FONT TYPE	= 4;
	OFFSET FONT SHAPE	= 5;

"variables"

 vector My font = FONT HEADER;

	My font alignment	= 4;
	My font body		= 16;
	My font width		= 8;
	My font type		= FIXED WIDTH FONT;

My font shape =
